attributes.name: Aspenglen Campground
attributes.description: Aspenglen Campground is reservation only. Visit Recreation.gov. Aspenglen opens for the 2023 season on May 26. Timed Entry Permits are included with your camping reservation. For Aspenglen Campers, your reservation includes access to Bear Lake Road. Campers will be able to initially enter the park beginning at 1 p.m. on the first day of your camping reservation. If you plan to enter the park earlier in the day, you will have to enter the park outside of the times when Timed Entry Permits are in effect.

images.title: Aspenglen Campground
images.altText: Road through pines with tent sites
images.caption: Aspenglen Campground is nestled in a pine forest near Fall River

images.title: Campsite with popup camper and comfort station
images.altText: Popup camper at campsite with picnic table and comfort station
images.caption: A typical campsite at Aspenglen Campground.

images.title: Aspenglen Comfort Station
images.caption: A comfort station (restroom) at Aspenglen Campground.

images.title: Food Storage Locker
images.altText: A visitor places food in a food storage locker
images.caption: Use food storage lockers to protect food from bears and other wildlife.

attributes.name: Backpacking Campsites in the Dunes or Forest
attributes.description: The most popular and unique backpacking option is camping in the 30-square-mile dunefield, beyond the major dune ridgeline (about 1.5 mile hike minimum over dunes). Enjoy wide open views of the starry sky or a bright moonlit night. Designated sites are also available in the trees of the foothills, or camping is available in higher forests of Great Sand Dunes National Preserve. Reserve national park backpacking permits for the dunes or foothills through recreation.gov

images.title: Backpacking in the Dunes
images.altText: Backpackers walking on eastern side of dunefield
images.caption: Backpacking in the dunes is a unique experience, with open views of the sky.

images.title: Backpacker in Dunefield
images.altText: Girl with backpack viewing dunes at sunset
images.caption: Backpacking into the dunes is a unique experience, with open views of the sky.

cost.description: Fee to make a required reservation for a backpacking permit through recreation.gov
